stories.title: Welcome to Plum!
stories.description: Your Health cards should reach you within 30 working days. But, rest-assured your policy covers you from day one! Till then, let's finish your onboarding and get you insur-ready and health-ready! Let’s discover what’s in store!

stories.title: Don't leave your home.
stories.description:
Not for doctor consultations, at least. Get 24x7 access to
20+ specialised doctors a click away on your phone.

stories.title: You sure you're hydrated?
stories.description: Take a quick test to keep a check on your overall well-being to catch any issues early.

stories.title: Well-being is cheaper now!
stories.description: Shop from all your favourite wellness brands at exclusive discounts.

stories.title: Ask it, it knows!
stories.description: Don't suffer in silence. Ask away your insurance doubts to PolicyGPT.

stories.title: We meet with you every week!
stories.description: Well-being doesn't have to be boring. Dance along in our weekly wellness sessions.

stories.title: Well-being is cheaper now!
stories.description: Count your dependents in on your healthcare journey from day one with independent login.

stories.title: How much would it cost?
stories.description: Plan things better with a time and expense estimate for any treatment you're planning in the upcoming days.

questions.question: My allergies started acting up. What to do?
questions.hint: You can book your Telehealth appointment anytime under the health section!
